Title: The Last Lawbreaker
Summary: A wrongful execution by the White Council leads to a hedge witch's revenge, unraveling ley lines and hidden secrets.

Title: Feast of Hearts
Summary: A forbidden love between a White Court vampire and a Knight of the Cross triggers a supernatural scandal threatening both factions.

Title: The Blood Vault
Summary: A long-hidden Red Court treasure vault resurfaces, sparking a supernatural treasure hunt with deadly consequences.

Title: Shattered Frost
Summary: The Winter Court teeters on the edge of civil war after Lady Elaris, former confidante of Queen Mab, is cast out for her affair with a Wyldfae Prince. Twisted by jealousy and heartbreak, she turns a Chicago art exhibit into a supernatural trap, where emotions bleed into the Nevernever itself. The PCs must navigate lethal Fae politics, supernatural betrayals, and mortal fallout before Mab's wrath descends.

Title: The Last Execution
Summary: When a vengeful witch taps into Chicago’s ley lines, threatening to unravel the city, the White Council’s secrets come spilling out. The PCs must trace a wrongful execution to a forgotten Warden scandal, confronting ghosts, bitter survivors, and ancient guilt before the ley storm consumes them all.

Title: Thorned Crown
Summary: When a Denarian coin finds its way into the hands of Pastor Caleb North, his sermons of hate turn into supernatural weapons. As violence escalates and the city burns with hatred, the players must confront ancient evil, personal grudges, and the demon hidden inside someone they trust.

Title: Midsummer's Heart
Summary: In the height of Summer, a forbidden love between a mortal and a Summer Sidhe disrupts the fragile boundary between reality and the Nevernever. As love blooms dangerously, a deadly fey hunt begins to reclaim what the Summer Court lost — while Winter spies seek to poison the romance. The PCs must protect love itself, or see Chicago swallowed by eternal Summer.

Title: Grave Promises
Summary: The Black Court stirs — and it’s personal. One of the PCs’ mortal allies is targeted by a vampire lord who was wronged decades ago. Bound by old vengeance, the undead walk Chicago’s streets, turning old friends into unwilling enemies. The PCs must uncover who betrayed whom, before the city becomes a battlefield for ancient grudges.

Title: Dead Funny
Summary: A mortal comedian accidentally invokes a curse during a stand-up routine, turning his audience into zombies every time he tells a joke. As Chicago descends into slapstick undead chaos, the PCs must find the source of the curse — and survive the most deadly comedy night of their lives.

Title: Blood Heir
Summary: A child born of mortal and Red Court blood is discovered in Chicago. Both sides want her — one to kill her, the other to crown her. Caught between a war and a prophecy, the PCs must decide: is this child the end of the Red Court or its rebirth?

Title: Death in the Void
Summary: A portal to the Outside opens beneath the Chicago River, leaking deadly energies that rot life itself. The PCs must dive into the infected underworld, navigating twisted ecosystems and corrupted ghosts, while Outsider servants offer terrible deals for survival. Life and death hang in the balance — along with Chicago’s fate.

Title: The Fractured Mind
Summary: A catastrophic magical accident shatters Warden Lysander Black’s mind into countless spectral echoes spread across Chicago. The players must navigate fractured realities, haunted memories, and malicious spirits feeding on the wizard’s madness. Meanwhile, Denarians sense weakness and seek to corrupt the fragments before they can be reassembled.

Title: Crossing Paths
Summary: A mundane traffic accident kills a young man — and shatters a long-dormant spirit jar hidden in his trunk. The released spirit blames the mortal who hit the car, setting off a supernatural vendetta fueled by confusion and chance. The PCs must intervene before fate itself spirals out of control.

Title: The Coin Flip
Summary: A street gambler finds a Denarian coin completely by accident — and miraculously resists full corruption. The coin twists reality around the gambler, making every decision a supernatural gamble. The players must retrieve the coin before the next toss determines Chicago’s fate.

Title: Ghostlight Vigil
Summary: A mourning ghost can’t stop reliving their own death — and its unresolved grief is poisoning Chicago’s ley lines. To lay the spirit to rest, the players must reconstruct the night of the fire, uncover its secrets, and confront both angry spirits and mourning families.

Title: Mourning Star
Summary: A grieving widow accidentally invites a Denarian into her soul while praying at her spouse’s grave. But her love is so powerful, the Fallen cannot fully corrupt her. The resulting half-possession radiates grief-fueled supernatural storms across the city. The players must either exorcise the Denarian — or weaponize her mourning into something no Denarian can endure.

Title: Haunted Masterpiece
Summary: A painting in a private gallery at the Art Institute of Chicago changes overnight, hiding cryptic clues. The investigators must determine if it channels a restless spirit or a sealed supernatural power.

Title: The Golem Guardians
Summary: The famous lion statues at the Art Institute may be golems bound by an ancient curse. Investigators are hired to uncover the truth, but breaking the curse risks releasing something far worse.

Title: Reflections of Fate
Summary: Visions of future tragedies appear in Cloud Gate's reflection. Investigators must interpret the visions and stop a supernatural conspiracy tied to the iconic sculpture.

Title: Fae Encounter at the Bean
Summary: During an equinox ritual, fae emerge through Cloud Gate’s reflective surface. The investigators must negotiate with the mischievous fae before they disrupt Chicago’s supernatural balance.

Title: Dimensional Rift in Millennium Park
Summary: A rare celestial alignment causes parts of Millennium Park to flicker with strange light. The investigators must find and seal a portal before dangerous entities cross over.

Title: U-Boat Anomaly
Summary: Strange vibrations emanate from the captured U-Boat at the Museum of Science and Industry. Investigators must uncover its link to a submerged portal and the ghostly crew.

Title: Ghosts of the Eastland
Summary: The Eastland Disaster victims begin appearing along the Riverwalk, reliving their final moments. Investigators must help them find peace while uncovering a darker conspiracy.

Title: Dino’s Curse
Summary: Nightmares and eerie sounds plague visitors near the Field Museum’s T-Rex exhibit. Investigators discover the dinosaur's remains house a bound spirit trying to escape.

Title: Vampiric Rendezvous
Summary: Supernatural power players gather at Trump Tower’s penthouse. Investigators are hired to spy on the meeting, stumbling into a deadly struggle between vampire factions.

Title: Buried Secrets of Lincoln Park
Summary: Beneath Lincoln Park’s beauty lies Chicago’s old cemetery. Construction awakens restless spirits tied to old injustices. The investigators must either lay them to rest—or help them seek revenge.

Title: Fire and Rebirth at Water Tower Place
Summary: Spontaneous magical fires plague Water Tower Place, seemingly tied to its miraculous survival during the Great Fire. Investigators must uncover the building’s ancient ward—and its purpose.

Title: The Billy Goat’s Curse Revisited
Summary: A resurgence of the infamous curse disrupts games at Wrigley Field. Investigators must determine whether belief alone powers the curse or if something darker has returned.

Title: The Masterpiece of Damnation
Summary: A White Court vampire has enchanted a painting at the Art Institute, feeding off visitors' emotions. A curator investigating the painting has vanished, and the investigators must uncover the vampiric plot before the painting opens to the public.

Title: The Curse in the Sculpture
Summary: A necromancer has planted a cursed artifact—made from human bones—into a new sculpture exhibit. Visitors fall ill and shadows creep through the halls. The investigators must stop the necromancer’s ritual before the dead rise.

Summary.text: A Denarian has corrupted Cloud Gate, using its reflective surface to trap people inside it and feed on their despair. The investigators must banish the Denarian’s influence without destroying the iconic sculpture.

Title: Shattered Dimensions
Summary: A Fomor sorcerer has twisted Cloud Gate into a portal to the Nevernever. Strange creatures leak into Millennium Park, warping reality itself. The investigators must seal the rift before the park collapses.

Title: A Fairy Court’s Claim
Summary: A minor fae lord declares Millennium Park sacred fae territory, enchanting the landscape into a twilight realm. A mortal child is taken by the fae, and the investigators must decide whether to defy the White Council’s hands-off decree to save them.

Title: The Red Court’s Experiment
Summary: A secret lab under the Museum of Science and Industry houses Red Court experiments on kidnapped humans, designed to create a new breed of vampires. The investigators must infiltrate the lab before the experiment is unleashed.

Title: The Black Court’s Feeding Grounds
Summary: Something hunts near the Chicago Riverwalk, and rumors point to a nest of newly turned Black Court vampires. The investigators must clear out the nest before the infestation spreads.

Title: A Demon’s Fossil
Summary: A T-Rex skull at the Field Museum has begun whispering to night guards, driving them mad. The skull contains the essence of a prehistoric demon eager to regain power. The investigators must perform a delicate exorcism.

Title: Vampiric Rendezvous Redux
Summary: Supernatural power players are meeting secretly in Trump Tower’s penthouse. The investigators are hired to spy, but soon uncover a deadly power struggle between rival White Court and Red Court factions.

Title: Ley Line of the Dead
Summary: A necromancer has discovered that Millennium Park sits at a ley-line intersection. Using the next full moon, they plan to raise an army of spirits. The investigators must stop the ritual before the city is overrun.

Title: The Drowned War
Summary: The Fomor are waging a hidden war beneath Lake Michigan, flooding into Chicago through ancient submerged gates. The players are caught in the middle when an ancient Wyld Fae ruler — whose respect they must earn — offers the key to closing the gates. But the Fomor won’t go down without unleashing a monstrous sea curse upon the city.

Title: Blood Debt of the Broken Blade
Summary: A fallen Knight of the Cross — driven by grief and a curse laid on their blade — is hunted by a demon who once faced the sword. The players must either help the cursed Knight restore their honor, or stand against both the Knight and the demon as they drag their battle into the mortal world.

Title: The Court of Shattered Oaths
Summary: A Wyld Fae ruler has been betrayed by her own court, and respect is the only currency that can mend the divide. The players must navigate the dangerous court politics, offering trials of respect to win allies while a curse spreads through the Nevernever.

Title: The Demon’s Chain
Summary: A mortal accidentally binds a demon with a cursed chain — forcing the demon to obey their commands, but also inflicting agony on the mortal every time the demon suffers. The players must break the chain before either the demon or the mortal dies from shared pain.

Summary.text: The Fomor launch an all-out supernatural war on Chicago’s waters — and a Knight of the Cross is ambushed and left for dead. As pain cripples the Knight, the players must fight on without them — unless they can uncover an ancient Wyld Fae boon to restore the Knight’s strength.
